title: What is a Sprint Retrospective?
content:
A Sprint Retro involves the whole team. It takes place after ther Sprint Review and before the next Sprint planning session. It is timeboxed at 4 hours max.
It is a time to refelect on what was created and how, identify what went well and improvements to make the next Sprint more effective and efficient
